name: CICDS | BOT | Configure project
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New workato configure project command to Slack Workbot

input.name: configure
input.parameters:
[
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Project name",
    "name": "project_name",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "ID",
    "name": "id",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Github repo",
    "name": "github_repo",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Reviewer username",
    "name": "reviewer_username",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Reviewer Slack",
    "name": "reviewer_slack",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Test folder",
    "name": "test_folder",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Prod folder",
    "name": "prod_folder",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": true,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Release mode",
    "name": "release_mode",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  }
]

extended_input_schema.empty_schema_title: Add variables by giving them a name, type and default value
extended_input_schema.label: Variables
extended_input_schema.name: variables

properties.label: name
properties.name: name
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

properties.label: id
properties.name: id
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
extended_input_schema.label: name
extended_input_schema.name: _cf_name

extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
extended_input_schema.label: id
extended_input_schema.name: id

block.comment: If release_mode is full - split project name into name and project ID before saving.

block.name: search_entries
block.description: Search entries in CICD | Projects configuration lookup table

extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.comment: Find if entry for the given ID is already present in the config table.

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2
block.description: Post command reply as Slack Workbot

message.title: :octagonal_sign: Duplicate entry found
message.attachment_text: We found another configuration for a given ID. Configured ID should be unique across projects. Existing configuration details below.

block.name: add_entry
block.description: Add entry to CICD | Projects configuration lookup table

extended_input_schema.hint: Fill the fields for the new entry
extended_input_schema.label: Entry fields
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: add_entry
block.description: Add entry to CICD | Audit logs lookup table

extended_input_schema.hint: Fill the fields for the new entry
extended_input_schema.label: Entry fields
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2
block.description: Post command reply as Slack Workbot

message.title: :white_check_mark: Project configured
message.attachment_text: You can now use this project to create new release and automated deployments.

block.comment: Display success message to the user.
If the entry is already present, do not configure again and let the user know.
If the project details are present, configure them in Projects Configuration lookup table.

block.name: block_kit_modals
block.description: Open a modal view as Slack Workbot

blocks.hint_text: Dev environment manifest ID that should be used for export. It can be found in the edit manifest URL.
GitHub repository to be used for creating release.
Pull request reviewer, it should be a valid GitHub username.
Target folder in test environment for automated import.
Target folder in production environment for automated import.

block.comment: Display configuration modal to the user.

block.name: call_recipe
block.description: Call CICD | RF | Create folders list
block.comment: Create list of all top-level projects in DEV environment.

block.name: block_kit_modals
block.description: Open a modal view as Slack Workbot

blocks.hint_text: GitHub repository to be used for creating release.
Pull request reviewer, it should be a valid GitHub username.

block.comment: Display configuration modal to the user.

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2
block.description: Post command reply as Slack Workbot

code.comment: Triggered on "workato configure project" command to display config options.
